title: Book Review: Doppelganger - A Trip Into the Mirror World by Naomi Klein ★★★★☆
summary: This book is excellent at describing the symptoms of madness which have beset the world. It expertly diagnoses the causes which have led so many people into a mirror-realm of fantasy. Sadly it falls short of prescribing a cure. I doubt anyone who has fallen into the conspiracy mindset will read this book - but I hope if you read it you will become inoculated against the brain-worms.  Let's…
